channel.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
channel.description:
Ok, so I am hosting 2 servers and I notice that the cmd keeps saying "Connection from: 24.229.1**.**".
I check random ips now and then, but this one stands out because they only connect to my 508 client they never come in game.
They log into the client 30 - 100 times aday, and I just checked there ip address and it says they are about 200 Miles from me... So.... What do ya'll think?

item.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

Def a status checker but hey, We all enjoy the free “Server Offline” publicity. Those are the only servers I join lol. Go ahead and firewall the checker =D.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a Stalker, need help please!

item.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Like cookie said, it might be a server status thing checking to see if your server is online.

Read full topic

Couldn’t it possibly, by coincidence, be a status checkers IP?

item.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

sweet sophia:

Could be, but after a couple hundred trys wouldn’t you stop trying?

Or he could be trying to ddos your server?

item.source: I have a Stalker, need help please!

item.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
item.dc:creator: @sweet_sophia sweet sophia
item.description:
@sweet_sophia wrote:

Ok, I consistantly recieve connections from an “Ip Address” the person loads the client and never loggs in, the person comes back 30 - 100 times aday, over and over and over again… I don’t no what to do, I think maybe he is trying to hack, but with 3 routers and a mask it’s pretty tricky, is that why he has to keep logging in? I have no clue… :\

UPDATE! I have added his “Ip Address” to my router’s firewalls, lets see if it blocks.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a Stalker, need help please!

item.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

IPBanning wouldn’t do anything. Download a firewall, or if your router has a build in firewall add the person to your routers ban list.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a Stalker, need help please!

item.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Could you clarify the situation?

item.title: I have a Stalker, need help please!
item.dc:creator: @sweet_sophia sweet sophia
item.description:
@sweet_sophia wrote:

How do you call 400 logs coincidence… :… How can I “Ipban” this “Ip” if he doesn’t fully log in? He is freaken me out…

Read full topic
